About

Disinformation Hub is a platform that allows students to use critical thinking to identify and understand mis/disinformation. Built by University of Hawaii at MƒÅnoa students, we hope that our daily challenge game and informational page helps bring more guidance to determining real and fake information online.

Snopes

snopes.com - Investigates rumors, myths, and misinformation online.

Mediawise

mediawise.org - Teaches people how to identify misinformation online with resources specifically for teens and seniors.

Invid Project

invid-project.edu - Browser plugin for video verification.

Google Images

images.google.com - Reverse image search to discover original sources of images.

Common Sense Media

commonsensemedia.org - Educational resources to help kids and families develop media literacy and safe internet habits.

Civic Online Reasoning

cor.inquirygroup.org - Free lessons and assessments designed to help students evaluate the credibility of online content.
